column1: Well, maybe because everyone can see the damage caused by coronavirus. Maybe because you can see the devastation!

I just can't stomach Kushner talking. "A great success" How can Kushner say that when the battle has not been won Coronavirus is still killing people. There is no win in this battle! So many lives lost loved ones. How can Trump and Kushner put a smiley face on this pandemic!
Study shows 1 in 10 coronavirus patients with diabetes die within a week. This is a big deal
Remember the corona virus? That was crazy.
